description: An extension of at least one of the hist-nat (histNAT) simulations to the year 2100 following SSP2-45 solar and volcanic forcing. The future solar forcing data recommended for CMIP6 has a downward trend (Matthes et al., 2016).
keywords: DAMIP, Tier 3, ssp245, natural forcing only
rationale: To investigate effects of this declining solar forcing on future climate change projections.

requirements.description: Scenario, from 2021 to the end of the 21st century
requirements.label: 2021-2100 80yrs

requirements.description: Impose changing volcanic forcing for RCP scenarios.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway, future, 21st century, volcanic forcing
requirements.label: RCP Volcanic

requirements.description: The standard solar forcing dataset recommended for usage is the solar reference scenario dataset which includes future solar forcing (2015-2299).  Includes total solar irradiance, F10.7 cm solar radio flux, and spectral solar irradiance for 10-100000 nm range.
requirements.keywords: Solar Forcing, Future, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
requirements.label: Future Solar Irradiance Forcing

requirements.description: Future solar particle forcing (2015-2299). For models with interactive stratospheric chemstiry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair produciont by galactic gosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
requirements.keywords: Solar forcing, Future, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
requirements.label: Future Solar Particle Forcing

requirements.canonical_name: Pre-Industrial Forcing Excluding Volcanic Aerosols and Solar Forcing
requirements.description: Pre-Industrial forcing excluding volcanic aerosols and solar forcing.
requirements.keywords: Pre-industrial forcing, excluding volcanic forcing, excluding solar forcing
requirements.label: Pre-Industrial Forcing Excluding Volcanic Aerosols and Solar Forcing

requirements.description: An ensemble of at least one simulation
requirements.keywords: minimum 1, at least 1, ensemble, run, simulation
requirements.label: MinimumOne

requirements.description: Initialisation data is taken from the end of the hist-nat simulation.
requirements.label: hist-nat initialisation

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model
requirements.label: AOGCM Configuration
